title: Includes the issuance and modification of zoning ordinances and regulations within the definition of the term "actions" for purposes of environmental quality review
summary: Includes the issuance and modification of zoning ordinances and regulations within the definition of the term "actions" for purposes of environmental quality review.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2455

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 21, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  MARCELLINO  -- read twice and ordered printed, and
         when printed to be committed to the Committee on Environmental Conser-
         vation

       AN ACT to amend the  environmental  conservation  law,  in  relation  to
         including  issuance of and modification of zoning ordinances and regu-
         lations within the definition of the term "actions"  for  purposes  of
         environmental quality review

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Paragraph (ii) of subdivision 4 of section  8-0105  of  the
    2  environmental conservation law, as amended by chapter 228 of the laws of
    3  1976, is amended to read as follows:
    4    (ii) policy, regulations, and procedure-making, INCLUDING THE ISSUANCE
    5  OR MODIFICATION OF ZONING ORDINANCES AND REGULATIONS.
    6    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06596-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to including issuance of and modification of zoning ordinances and regulations within the definition of the term "actions" for purposes of environmental quality review
